name: Classic Leading Ladies Online Quiz | Classics - Average 10 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Bette Davis had early successes in 'Of Human Bondage' and 'Petrified Forest'. Who co-starred with her in both films?
questions.explanation:
Leslie Howard.

	Good early roles for Davis. Howard, of course, is best known for 'Gone With The Wind'

questions.text: Joan Crawford's most famous movie is 'Mildred Pierce'. The movie opens with the shooting of a character played by what actor?
questions.explanation:
Zachary Scott.

	Probably Scott's most well-known role

questions.text: Claudette Colbert may be best remembered for 'It Happened One Night'. Who was her male co-star?
questions.explanation:
Clark Gable.

	Oscars all around in this movie

questions.text: Olivia DeHavilland is known for her many movies with Errol Flynn, her role in 'Gone With The Wind, and her feud with her sister, Joan Fontaine. She also did a fine job in 'The Heiress'. Who starred as her fortune hunting suitor?
Barbara Stanwyck is known for all of these movies EXCEPT
questions.explanation:
Auntie Mame.

	Her three most famous roles, I believe

questions.text: Lauren Bacall was paired with Humphrey Bogart in all of these movies EXCEPT
questions.explanation:
High Sierra.

	Ida Lupino was in that one

questions.text: Katharine Hepburn appeared with frequent co-star Spencer Tracy in all of these movies EXCEPT
questions.explanation:
On Golden Pond.

	That one was with Henry Fonda

questions.text: 'I Want To Live!' was perhaps the best role for this actress:
This actress was known not only for her movies, but for her role as host of a TV series.
This actress made several movies with her good friend, John Wayne.
questions.explanation:
Maureen O'Hara.

	McClintock, Quiet Man, etc.
